G

getBaseMidPoint() - Method in class MiniFig
Get the Point (x,y) representing the bottom middle of the MiniFig.
getCapPoint() - Method in class MiniFig
Get the Point (x,y) representing the top of the face.
getFaceHeight() - Method in class MiniFig
Get the height of the MiniFig's face.
getFaceWidth() - Method in class MiniFig
Get the width of the MiniFig's face.
getHeight() - Method in class MiniFig
Get the total height of the MiniFig, measured from the top of of the knob to the bottom of the feet.
getLeftHandCenterPoint() - Method in class MiniFig
Get the Point (x,y) representing the center of the left hand from the MiniFig's perspective.
getLeftShoulderPoint() - Method in class MiniFig
Get the Point (x,y) representing the left shoulder from the MiniFig's perspective.
getRightHandCenterPoint() - Method in class MiniFig
Get the Point (x,y) representing the center of the right hand from the MiniFig's perspective.
getRightShoulderPoint() - Method in class MiniFig
Get the Point (x,y) representing the right shoulder from the MiniFig's perspective.
getTopMidPoint() - Method in class MiniFig
Get the Point (x,y) representing the top middle of the MiniFig.
getWidth() - Method in class MiniFig
Get the total width of the MiniFig, measured from the outside edge of the right hand to the outside edge of the left hand.
